CustomField.description: Displays red, yellow, or green image based on Spend_Status_Value_vod__c.
CustomField.formula: CASE(Spend_Status_Value_vod__c, "Below_Threshold_vod", IMAGE("/resource/vod_green_circle", "Below Monitoring Threshold"), "Monitor_vod", IMAGE("/resource/vod_yellow_triangle", "Monitor Spend"), "Cease_vod", IMAGE("/resource/vod_red_square", "Cease Spend"), IMAGE("/resource/vod_green_circle", "Below Monitoring Threshold"))
CustomField.label: Spend Status
